body.name: Mckanti 8 Pcs Drink Coasters with Holder, Minimalist Cotton Woven 4 Colors Absorbent Coaster Set for Home Decor Tabletop Protection Suitable for Kinds of Cups, 4.3 Inches.(NO.2)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 🍷What You Get: You will get more quantity and more multiple styles coasters from us than any others . You'll get 8pcs round hand-woven cotton coasters (ultra-minimalist style, 4.3") and a 4.3"x3.1" black metal coaster holder.4 colors designs 8pcs in total, which can be used in almost any family scene.

🥛Why Choose Us?: Mckanti is committed to making better products intelligently. We abandon the complex and dazzling appearance design and focus on the functional characteristics of the product. This beverage coaster is designed in a minimalist style, natural and safe, and perfectly integrated Any home decor style. Whether it's the kitchen, bedroom, dining table, or every corner of the home, a variety of cups,this coaster can easily handle it.

🍷No More Fear of Spills: Mckanti drink coasters are handcrafted from 100% cotton and linen. They are more absorbent than other silicone or ceramic coasters. This coaster instantly absorbs spilled moisture and then miraculously evaporates , keep it dry and clean at all times. All you need to do is place your drink on the Mckanti drink coaster and enjoy your drink time.

🥛Care More About Your Tabletop: Mckanti drink coasters are so soft, don't need worry about them scratching furniture. It doesn't make much noise when placing the cups on the table as well.This coaster can also be effectively insulated, and when you enjoy hot drinks, it will not leave any traces left by the hot water on the table.

🍷Keep Coasters and Tabletops Simple: we have a coaster holder for each set of coasters. The iron frame is made of ferrous metal, which is stain-proof, scratch-proof and rust-proof. You no longer have to bear the burden of coasters that placing everywhere. When not in use, you can put them directly into the holder, which will make your home more tidy. This coaster is washable, just rinse with water and hang to dry and continuing to use. Keep the simplicity of coasters and tabletops at all times.
☎Kindly Service☎ Your satisfaction is our priority, any problem with our coasters kits, please do not hesitate to contact us, we will help you solve the problem within 24 hours.
body.description: Mckanti 8 Pcs Drink Coasters with Holder A Minimalist Style Works Best with Your Desktop Mckanti coasters have a minimalist style that matches most tabletop and cups. And coasters are handcrafted with beautiful lines and textures that make them great for decorating your desktop Keep Your Desktop Clean and Dry Mckanti coasters are made of 100% cotton and are highly absorbent, quickly absorbing water that spills out of the cup Protect Your Desktop Mckanti coasters are very soft and will protect your table top from scratches and burns

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and valuable coasters
reviews.reviewText: These are super cute, a great deal for so many coasters and a nice neutral set of colors with a nice little pattern thrown in. Like that it also comes with a little coaster holder. Absorbent when drinks have a little condensation on them. Would hold any standard size drink cups. Not non slip for the table itself, but it’s not advertised that way anyway. Kids also enjoy throwing them around the room like frisbees as a game- so duel uses, so that’s a win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great coasters!!! Great quality, not too thin or flimsy. Well made and they stay secure in the holder. Love the earth tone colors. I am very satisfied with these coasters!!! They do the job and look nice!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased 2 sets of these coasters now because they are simply the best! They are very absorbent, and don’t leave a trail of water or mess to clean up. They’re very stylish and come in neutral colors, and have a simple holder. Very good price point for these high quality coasters!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice and thick, happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish Sips with a Few Quirks
reviews.reviewText: I'm a fan of a stylish coaster, and the Mckanti 8-piece set caught my eye with its minimalist woven design and handy storage holder. After using them for a while, I have to say they're mostly a hit, but not without a few quirks.The Good:Looks that last: These coasters are undeniably charming. The woven cotton adds a touch of texture and warmth to any tabletop, and the four neutral colors (grey, beige, brown, and dark grey) blend seamlessly with most decors. They're a definite step up from your average boring cork coaster!Absorbent heroes: Spills happen, and these coasters handle them like champs. The cotton quickly soaks up condensation and drips, protecting your surfaces from water rings and stains. No more coasters turning into soggy islands!Keeper of the coasters: The included metal holder is a nice touch. It keeps the coasters organized and accessible when not in use, preventing them from getting scattered around like tumbleweeds. Plus, it looks pretty sleek sitting on the counter.Easy care: A quick hand wash or spot clean is all it takes to keep these coasters looking fresh. No need for complicated washing routines or harsh chemicals.The Quirky:Size matters: These coasters are on the smaller side, measuring 4.3 inches in diameter. While they're perfect for standard glasses and mugs, larger cups or tumblers might require some coaster Tetris to fit comfortably.Heat caution: While the coasters absorb condensation well, they're not designed for hot beverages. Placing a steaming mug directly on them might leave a mark or damage the cotton. A heat pad between the mug and coaster is recommended for hot drinks.Not dishwasher friendly: Although handwashing is a breeze, some dishwasher convenience would be nice. Just be aware that these coasters aren't meant for the machine.Overall Verdict:Despite the minor quirks, I really enjoy using the Mckanti coasters. They're stylish, absorbent, and functional (with a little heat caution). The included holder is a bonus, and the price point is very reasonable. If you're looking for a set of coasters that add a touch of style and function to your home without breaking the bank, I recommend giving these a try. Just keep the size and heat limitations in mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a good buy….exactly as I expected. It is cute and well made. I t is well made and thick enough to put a cup of coffee or any beverage on it to keep my furniture from water marks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They look stylish to leave out on the table. More importantly they work to absorb and they don’t suction to the bottom like the stone ones can.

These are very cute and look nice. Well made, wider than most coasters. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it doesn’t come with the holder, but I don’t mind as I have a couple in different rooms. Great purchase, highly recommend.
I like these coasters very much. Very nice. Look nice and keep glasses and cups from sweating on furniture. This product is well put together and a great product worth buying.
They are cute and level and look great in holder! Highly recommend
